message.content:
{"id": "124066", "title": "Bug 124066: Insert chart in context menu is not translated into Chinese", 
"description": "Bug 124066: In the context menu, the option to insert a chart is not being translated into Chinese.", 
"OB": "When right clicking in the layout to bring up the context menu, the expected behavior is for the 'Insert chart' option to be translated into Chinese.", 
"EB": "When right clicking in the layout to bring up the context menu, the 'Insert chart' option is not being translated into Chinese.", 
"SR": "Investigate the issue with the 'Insert chart' translation in the context menu and ensure that it is correctly translated into Chinese."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
